科学上网漫游指南

https://lvii.gitbooks.io/outman/content/ss.mac.html

Ubuntu 16安装shadowsocks服务器

  1. 执行命令

    sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install shadowsocks

  2. 配置/etc/shadowsocks/config.json, 修改server为0.0.0.0, password为你需要设置的值

    { "server":"your_server_ip", "server_port":8388, "local_address": "127.0.0.1", "local_port":1080, "password":"your_password", "timeout":300, "method":"aes-256-cfb", "fast_open":false, "workers":1, }

  3. 启动服务: sudo service shadowsocks restart
